title: Elemental Lux Request

embed.description: An inside look at the whats, whys, and hows of making League of Legends.

body:
In regards of creating one of the best gaming logins of all times, I would like to know if there a way to request an mp4 (or media format) of this? There several places to get the animation or music but never together. 

_I don't play Lux that much, I went ahead and purchased the skins as a way of saying thank you (and Thresh, got to have Thresh >:) _

replies.body:
Not exactly what you are looking for but the login screen w/ music is up on the LoL Youtube and should be available on the Screensaver app soon:
https://youtu.be/2gU_HpD0hWY
http://screensaver.na.leagueoflegends.com/en_US
